casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Ruth Estela ISAZA and Maria Victoria Isaza, Appellants. No. 368, Docket 71-1550.

(Reporting Services Requested to Publish Headnote Only)

United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Jan. 6, 1972. Decided Jan. 19, 1972.

Before HAYS, FEINBERG and MANSFIELD, Circuit Judges.
